notes.text:
Use the ripest tomatoes for best flavor
Roast tomatoes first for deeper flavor
Perfect with grilled cheese sandwiches

steps.descr: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by sautéing the onion and garlic in some lovely olive oil until they're nice and soft. You'll know it's ready when the kitchen smells amazing!

steps.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft

steps.descr: Add tomatoes and cook until they break down

on_enter.say: Now, let's add those beautiful ripe tomatoes and cook them until they start to break down. You'll see them getting all juicy and lovely!

steps.instructions: Add tomatoes and cook until they break down

steps.descr: Pour in stock, add basil and sugar

on_enter.say: Let's pour in the vegetable stock, and add a handful of fresh basil and a spoonful of sugar. This is going to balance the flavors beautifully!

steps.instructions: Pour in stock, add basil and sugar

on_enter.say: Time to let our soup simmer gently for 15 minutes. This will let all those fantastic flavors mingle together. You can give it a little stir now and then.
Brilliant! Now let's blend everything until it's smooth and creamy. Be careful with hot liquids, and take your time.
Let's give our soup a taste and season it with a bit of salt and pepper. Adjust it to your liking!

steps.descr: Serve with a swirl of cream and fresh basil

on_enter.say: Time to serve up this gorgeous soup! Add a swirl of double cream and a few fresh basil leaves on top. Enjoy every spoonful!

steps.instructions: Serve with a swirl of cream and fresh basil

recipe.title: Fresh Tomato Soup
recipe.description: Smooth, comforting soup made with ripe tomatoes and basil
